rdf:Description.dc:title: A Handbook of Freethought: Containing in Condensed and Systematized Form a Vast Amount of Evidence Against the Superstitious Doctrines of Christianity.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: William S. Bell (b. 1832)

rdf:Description.dc:subject: Free thought
rdf:Description.dc:description: A collection of articles on various subjected related to freethought.
